document.heading: Downtown Retail TIF Amendment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-129, the “Downtown Retail TIF Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-451 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 11, 2007, and January 8, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 29, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-279 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-129 became effective on March 20, 2008.

BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Downtown Retail TIF Amendment Act of 2008”. Sec. 2.
